QuestData.Title: No Party Like a Trogg Party
QuestData.Description: Troggs? At my party?$b$bMy grandfather pushed them back to that cleft years ago to build this estate. To think that they would attack in such force after all these years?$b$bThis is just what we needed to make this year's festival the greatest ever!$b$bShow us your heroism firsthand, $n! Mount Cooper and defeat these troggs! Drag them behind you, jab them with your harpoon... whatever it takes!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Grimestone troggs in Norwington Estate.
QuestData.CompletionText: Troggs on the estate grounds? What meaning is this!?
QuestData.RewardText: A grand showing! You had me on the edge of my seat!
